unnormalised: SpiceJet flt SG304 was delayed due to technical issues, bhai! Passengers were stuck at the Delhi airport for 6 hrs! My cousin, Rohan Sharma, travelling with PNR no. ZXCV12, missed his connecting flight to Patna.
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G three zero four was delayed due to technical issues, bhai! Passengers were stuck at the Delhi airport for six hours! My cousin, Rohan Sharma, travelling with P-N-R no. Z-X-C-V one two, missed his connecting flight to Patna.

unnormalised: The airline offered vouchers worth Rs. 200, but many folks were complaining. One passenger, Aisha Khan, with her ticket no. 1234567890, said she had an important meeting! Seems like SpiceJet's customer service (ref. ID 9876543210) is gonna have a long day sorting this mess out.
normalised: The airline offered vouchers worth rupee two hundred, but many folks were complaining. One passenger, Aisha Khan, with her ticket no. one two three four five six seven eight nine zero, said she had an important meeting! Seems like SpiceJet's customer service (reference I-D nine eight seven six five four three two one zero) is gonna have a long day sorting this mess out.

unnormalised: Heard some people are planning to file complaints with the DGCA. Hopefully, they get some kinda resolution soon. Travel safe, everyone!
normalised: Heard some people are planning to file complaints with the D-G-C-A. Hopefully, they get some kind of resolution soon. Travel safe, everyone!
